item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Connie Francis - The Wedding (la novia)
item.description:
anyone has the good quality of this old gem? its a staple on every 80s-90s Chinese wedding in INDONESIA. its so nostalgic.
I know there are many Indonesian users here, I hope any of you could help.
I need the English version, The Wedding (from album of the same title - The Wedding , it's also on some old 60s compilation vinyl and album. im sure this was very popular back then at least in parts of Asia.
Julie Rogers also has a version, but that isn't the well known version we used back home.
the original Spanish version La Novia is way easier to find, I just cannot find the English version and the YouTube vid available is poor quality audio

thank you
item.author: babywaffles
